name: Katamari On The Unity
description:
The King has destroyed most of the stars, but then accidentally shrunk the Prince to 1cm! Help the Prince reach back to his normal size by using the Katamari roll up things from breadcrumbs to entire islands!

   

Controls:

Up Arrow, W: Move Forwards

Down Arrow, S: Move Backwards,

Left Arrow, A: Move Left

Tight Arrow, D: More Right

Mouse: Move the camera

If you ever get stuck between the objects, press the R key to royal warp, but remember, you can only use it once every 5 seconds so don't use it as an advantage!

You can roll up anything as long as the object is half the katamari's diameter. Go up ramps when you build up speed. It becomes easier if the katamari is rounder. Get the katamari's size goal before the time runs out.
